label: Travel Accessories
description: Products and items used for travel and transportation.
intents: Find luggage and suitcases for sale.
Purchase travel accessories such as toiletry bags and passport covers.
Find lightweight and durable travel gear.
Organize and store makeup and toiletries for travel.
Find adapters and plugs for international travel.
Find sleep aids for travel such as eye masks and pillows.

subcategories.label: Luggage and Suitcases
subcategories.description: Bags and cases used for transporting personal belongings.

subcategories.label: Travel Toiletries
subcategories.description: Products used for personal hygiene and grooming while traveling.

subcategories.label: Travel Adapters and Plugs
subcategories.description: Electrical adapters and plugs used for international travel.

subcategories.label: Sleep Aids
subcategories.description: Products used to aid sleep while traveling.
